package com.yulin.pm;

public class Circle extends Shape {

	public Circle(int r) {
		super(r);
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	}

	@Override
	public double zhouchang() {
		double zc = Math.PI * getR();
		return zc;
	}

	@Override
	public double mianji() {
		double mj = Math.PI * getR() * getR();
		return mj;
	}

	
	
	

}
